author: Merrilees Parker
method: Heat the oil in a wok. Add the onions and spices and fry for 3-5 minutes until the onions are transparent.  Tip in the tomatoes and cook for a minute or two.   Throw in the okra and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until the okra is cooked through.   Season well and serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp sunflower or vegetable oil,  1 onion, chopped,  ½ tsp ground cumin,  ½ tsp ground coriander,  ½ tsp chilli powder,  ¼ tsp ground turmeric,  150g/5¼ oz tomatoes, chopped,  450g/16oz okra, cut into 1in/3cm pieces
